name: Connaught Place
description: Central business hub known for colonial architecture, shopping, and easy Metro access.

name: Hauz Khas
description: Trendy neighborhood with cafes, art galleries, and a historic lake and deer park.

name: Karol Bagh
description: Famous for shopping streets and traditional eateries, Karol Bagh blends commerce with residential charm.

name: Greater Kailash
description: A high-end residential neighborhood known for M-block market, premium homes, and a quiet environment.

name: Saket
description: A well-connected locality featuring malls, hospitals, and proximity to Qutub Minar.

name: Rohini
description: One of the largest sub-cities in Asia, offering a structured residential layout and metro connectivity.

name: Lajpat Nagar
description: Buzzing with markets and multicultural vibes, ideal for students and families alike.

name: Dwarka
description: A modern township with wide roads, green belts, and excellent metro and airport access.

name: Vasant Kunj
description: Premium residential area surrounded by malls, diplomatic enclaves, and healthcare centers.

name: Chandni Chowk
description: Historic heart of Old Delhi, rich in street food, spice markets, and Mughal architecture.

name: Patel Nagar
description: Balanced residential and commercial neighborhood with good road and metro connections.

name: Ashok Vihar
description: Planned locality with spacious parks, schools, and peaceful surroundings.

name: Punjabi Bagh
description: Upscale colony with large bungalows, lush parks, and elite club facilities.

name: Rajouri Garden
description: Popular western Delhi hub with vibrant retail, dining, and easy metro access.

name: Janakpuri
description: Family-friendly area offering affordable housing, wide roads, and local shopping complexes.

name: Pitampura
description: Well-established locality with schools, markets, and access to Ring Road.

name: Mayur Vihar
description: Green and peaceful locality near Yamuna river with parks and cooperative housing.

name: Shalimar Bagh
description: Leafy neighborhood with parks and well-maintained residential complexes.

name: Preet Vihar
description: East Delhi hub with educational institutions and great metro access.

name: Kalkaji
description: Mix of commercial and residential spaces, known for its temple and connectivity.

name: Okhla
description: Diverse area with industrial and residential zones, close to Jamia Millia Islamia.

name: Malviya Nagar
description: Trendy South Delhi spot with cafes, gyms, and proximity to Hauz Khas and Saket.

name: Yamuna Vihar
description: Peaceful East Delhi colony with schools, green parks, and community centers.

name: Model Town
description: Planned colony offering a blend of old-world charm and modern living.

name: Tilak Nagar
description: Known for Punjabi culture, market areas, and easy accessibility via metro.

name: Kingsway Camp
description: Student-centric zone near Delhi University with good eateries and PGs.

name: Paschim Vihar
description: Upper-middle-class residential area with schools, malls, and metro service.

name: Sarai Rohilla
description: A transit-rich hub, home to a major railway station and urban housing.

name: Mehrauli
description: Historic village area near Qutub Minar with a mix of tradition and growth.

name: Jangpura
description: Cosmopolitan neighborhood with access to Lajpat Nagar and India Habitat Centre.

name: Sundar Nagar
description: Quiet, upscale colony near Purana Qila and Delhi Zoo with artistic vibes.

name: Geeta Colony
description: Affordable residential locality in East Delhi with parks and flyover access.

name: Sadar Bazaar
description: Bustling wholesale market zone with narrow lanes and traditional homes.

name: Azadpur
description: Major transport interchange and produce hub with increasing residential activity.

name: Mandawali
description: Middle-class locality with good road access and basic amenities.

name: Nehru Place
description: Primarily a business district, with some residential apartments and tech access.

name: Bhogal
description: Cultural mini-town near Nizamuddin, offering religious centers and eateries.

name: Tughlakabad
description: Historic area with fort ruins and developing residential infrastructure.

name: Daryaganj
description: Old Delhi neighborhood known for Sunday book market and Mughal-era charm.

name: Rajendra Nagar
description: Elite locality with coaching centers, quiet lanes, and metro connectivity.

name: Paharganj
description: Budget traveler’s paradise near New Delhi Railway Station with lively streets.

name: GTB Nagar
description: Popular with students of Delhi University, with many PGs and cafes.

name: Gole Market
description: Colonial-era market district near Connaught Place with urban charm.

name: Seelampur
description: Affordable locality with a strong sense of community and local markets.

name: Gandhi Nagar
description: One of Asia’s largest garment markets, mixed with dense residential living.

name: Nangloi
description: Expanding outer Delhi locality with metro connectivity and urban villages.

name: Chittaranjan Park
description: Strong Bengali cultural presence with Durga Puja festivities and fish markets.

name: Munirka
description: Affordable living option for students and working professionals in South Delhi.

name: Narela
description: Fast-growing urban extension with new residential projects and basic infrastructure.

name: Burari
description: Semi-urban North Delhi area witnessing rapid infrastructure development.
